summary: The bond of friendship between a worldly-wise Army Master Sergeant and his naive worshiper.
cast: Jackie Gleason|Steve McQueen|Tuesday Weld|Tony Bill|Tom Poston|Ed Nelson|Lew Gallo|Rockne Tarkington|Paul Hartman|John Hubbard|Chris Noel|Sam Flint|Lewis Charles|Adam West|Diane Sayer
title: Compañeros de armas y puñetazos
